Tab.name: file_names
Tab.caption: Discharge and downstream water surface elevation settings

Item.name: discharge
Item.caption: Time series of discharge and downstream stage

Item.name: read_flag
Item.caption: Calculate from initial or temporary file

Item.name: h_down
Item.caption: Constant value of down stream water surface elevation (h_down)

Item.name: j_slope
Item.caption: How to set slope for uniform flow calculation (j_slope)

Item.name: bh_slope
Item.caption: Constant slope value for uniform flow calculation (bh_slope)

Item.name: j_slope_cal
Item.caption: How to calculate slope for uniform flow calculation (j_slope_cal)

Enumeration.caption: (1) calculate from bathymetric of every time step

Item.name: i_down_range
Item.caption: Section numbers for clculating the bed slope for uniform flow (use all data if negative) (i_down_range)

Enumeration.caption: (3) use same profile as one cross section dwonstream
(1) calculate from upper part bathmetric data
(1) Polygonal line (two lines and one break point)

Item.name: x_bk
Item.caption: Distance of first break point from downstream end

Item.name: h_slope_1
Item.caption: Water surface slope of the first line from downstream end

Item.name: h_slope_2
Item.caption: Water surface slope of the first line from downstream end

Item.name: j_cip
Item.caption: Finite differential scheme for advection terms

Item.name: snst
Item.caption: Intensity of secondary flow (for sediment transport in lateral direction)

Item.name: lmax
Item.caption: Maximum iteration times for water surface computation

Item.name: alh
Item.caption: Relaxation coefficient for water surface computation

GroupBox.caption: Parameters of water, bed and bank material

Item.name: tantc_e
Item.caption: Tangent value of angle of repose (for bank failure)

Item.name: sint3
Item.caption: Intensity Coefficient for Secondary Flow (for 3d flow field calculation)
